sections.heading: of attorney in fact; commencement
sections.text: The authority of the attorney in fact shall commence upon a determination pursuant to section 30-3412 that the principal is incapable of making health care decisions.SourceLaws 1992, LB 696, ยง 11.

30-3411.Authority of attorney in fact; commencement.

The authority of the attorney in fact shall commence upon a determination pursuant to section 30-3412 that the principal is incapable of making health care decisions.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 696, ยง 11.
